name: Gumball Galaxy
description:
A co-op puzzle game!                        
                  

Uh oh, the Gumballs have ran out of fuel! Luckily, Captain Caramel notice that there is some spare fuel lying around the ship! Help the Gumballs use ; machinery to solve puzzles by navigating the fuel balls to the fuel tank!  The  Gumballs need to get to their home planet of Candio!

Design by:  Ewan Fisher,  Cyprian Przybyla,  Aidan Black

Programming by:  Ewan Fisher,  Aidan Black

Art by:  Cyprian Przybyla

With music by:  Nathan MacMillan
